Uses of Class
com.deltaxml.pipe.XMLFilterImpl2

  • Packages that use XMLFilterImpl2 
    Package Description
    com.deltaxml.pipe
    This package provides extensions to the SAX parsing API.
    com.deltaxml.pipe.filters
    This package provides SAX event based filter implementations.
    com.deltaxml.pipe.filters.dx2.wbw
    This package contains filters for use in Word By Word pipelines, as is discussed in the Filters for Document Processing guide, as well as the JavaDoc for each of the filters.
    com.deltaxml.pipe.filters.dx2.wbw.format  
    com.deltaxml.pipe.filters.dx2.wbw.v62
    This package contains the versions of the Word by Word pipeline filter which were replaced in XML Compare 6.3.

    • Uses of XMLFilterImpl2 in com.deltaxml.pipe

      Subclasses of XMLFilterImpl2 in com.deltaxml.pipe 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AncestorXMLFilter
      Stores a stack of the elements that are ancestor to the current context in the SAXStream.
      class  XMLFilterImpl3
      Provides an extensible class for filtering SAX events, including lexical events such as XML comments.
      Constructors in com.deltaxml.pipe with parameters of type XMLFilterImpl2 
      Constructor and Description
      XMLPushFilterAdapter(XMLFilterImpl2 filter)
      Does support LexicalHandler events such as comments.

    • Uses of XMLFilterImpl2 in com.deltaxml.pipe.filters

      Subclasses of XMLFilterImpl2 in com.deltaxml.pipe.filters 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CleanHouse
      Removes all elements or attributes in specified deltaxml namespaces.
      class  LexicalPreservationBase
      The round trip processing markup filter.
      class  NormalizeSpace
      Removes whitespace in PCDATA and attributes in an XML file.
      class  PCDataConcatenatingInfilter
      This class concatenates a series of XMLFilterImpl.characters(char[], int, int) into a single event, which can be handled with PCDataConcatenatingInfilter.bufferedCharacters(char[], int, int).

    • Uses of XMLFilterImpl2 in com.deltaxml.pipe.filters.dx2.wbw

      Subclasses of XMLFilterImpl2 in com.deltaxml.pipe.filters.dx2.wbw 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  OrphanedWordOutfilter
      This is an optional fixup outfilter which is part of the Word by Word pipeline.
      class  WordBufferingFilter
      This abstract filter should be extended by outfilters that process blocks of word/space/punctuation elements.
      class  WordInfilter
      This class provides a way of breaking or segmenting large sequences of text (such as paragraphs and sentences) into smaller segments or chunks so that change can be reported at finer granularity.
      class  WordOutfilter
      This is the outfilter for the Word by Word pipeline, which is discussed in the Filters for Document Processing guide.
      class  WordRedGreenOutfilter
      This class is used to sort sequences of added/deleted words.

    • Uses of XMLFilterImpl2 in com.deltaxml.pipe.filters.dx2.wbw.format

    • Uses of XMLFilterImpl2 in com.deltaxml.pipe.filters.dx2.wbw.v62

      Subclasses of XMLFilterImpl2 in com.deltaxml.pipe.filters.dx2.wbw.v62 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  WordInfilter62
      This is the infilter for the Word by Word pipeline, which is discussed in the Filters for Document Processing guide.
      class  WordOutfilter62
      This is the outfilter for the Word by Word pipeline, which is discussed in the Filters for Document Processing guide.
      class  WordSpaceFixup62
      This is a fixup outfilter which is part of the Word by Word pipeline, which is discussed in the Filters for Document Processing guide.
